Accessor function to extract selected temperature bounds

Source: R/temp_bounds.R
temp_bounds.Rd

Accessor function to extract selected temperature bounds

temp_bounds(object)

Arguments

object

the output of either the process or deconvolve functions

Value

Temperature bounds of the data in the object

Examples

data(juncus)
tmp <- process(juncus, 'temp_C', 'mass_loss', 18.96, temp_type = 'C')
temp_bounds(tmp)
#> [1]  31.505 798.515

  • Value
